skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: utah jazz
Developer Terms of Use
des: The official Utah Jazz skill is your guide to every NBA season. Whether you’re looking for a recap of last night’s action, or looking for the Jazz's next game and how to watch it, this skill has you covered. You can also get the latest team headlines, stat leaders for every game, and check the Jazz's current conference standing!
